javadoc:
Methods for a listener that is called when changes are made to a
 MemoryBlock.

methods.name: nameChanged
commentChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the block's comment changed.

methods.name: readStatusChanged
methods.comment: Notification the block's read attribute has changed.

params.name: isRead
params.comment: true means the block is marked as readable

methods.name: writeStatusChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the block's write attribute has changed.

params.name: isWrite
params.comment: true means the block is marked as writable

methods.name: executeStatusChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the block's execute attribute has changed.

params.name: isExecute
params.comment: true means the block is marked as executable

methods.name: sourceChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the source of the block has changed.

methods.name: sourceOffsetChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the source offset has changed.

methods.name: dataChanged
methods.comment: Notification that bytes changed in the block.

name: MemoryBlockListener
comment:
Methods for a listener that is called when changes are made to a
 MemoryBlock.
